VIII.iv.6.B.1.e
.
Definition: Express Consent
Express consent
is a type of informed consent that has been clearly stated either orally or in writing.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section B - Rating Claims Filed Under 38 U.S.C. 1151
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section B
